channel.title: Help with setting up an ip
channel.description:
ok so i made this really cool server only 1 problem...i went to no-ip.com and did the stuff i needed to then i started my server went to another computer tried using that ip and it wouldntt let me on :confused:
and i dont know if i need to port forward because there is a router on a diferent computer and i use its wireless connection do i need to port forward? please help ive been tryin stuff for days
thanks, craig

item.title: Help with setting up an ip
item.dc:creator: @craigc1509 craigc1509
item.description:
@craigc1509 wrote:

so go to options on the no-ip.DUC and make 2 ports?
[br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 11:37:21 AM[/size][hr]oooooo ok i saw one on tut’s thanks tho

Read full topic
